Experience Norwegian Charm at Clarion Collection Hotel Tollboden in Drammen Nestled in the heart of Drammen, Norway, Clarion Collection Hotel Tollboden offers a charming and comfortable stay for both business and leisure travelers. With its prime location and impeccable service, this 3-star hotel is the perfect choice for those seeking a memorable stay in this picturesque city. At Clarion Collection Hotel Tollboden , guests will find themselves surrounded by a warm and inviting atmosphere. The hotel features 127 well-appointed rooms, each designed with comfort and convenience in mind. Whether you're traveling alone or with family, there is a room to suit every need. From cozy single rooms to spacious suites, each accommodation is tastefully decorated with modern furnishings and offers a range of amenities to ensure a pleasant stay. Check-in at Clarion Collection Hotel Tollboden begins at 03:00 PM, allowing guests ample time to settle in and start exploring the city. The friendly and attentive staff are always ready to assist with any requests or provide recommendations on the best attractions and dining options in the area. With a check-out time of 12:00 PM, guests can enjoy a leisurely morning before bidding farewell to this delightful hotel. Families traveling with young children will be pleased to know that Clarion Collection Hotel Tollboden has a generous child policy. Children between the ages of 0 to 12 can stay free of charge, making it an ideal choice for a family getaway. The hotel's comfortable and spacious rooms provide plenty of space for little ones to play and relax, ensuring a stress-free stay for both parents and children. Clarion Collection Hotel Tollboden is more than just a place to rest your head - it's an experience in itself. With its convenient location, comfortable accommodations, and child-friendly policies, this hotel is the perfect base for exploring the beauty of Drammen. Book your stay today and discover the charm of this Norwegian gem. Unwind and Indulge in a Variety of Entertainment Facilities at Clarion Collection Hotel Tollboden At Clarion Collection Hotel Tollboden , guests are treated to a wide range of entertainment facilities that cater to their every need. Whether you're looking to relax, socialize, or explore, this hotel has it all. Step into the hotel's stylish bar and enjoy a refreshing drink or two. The bar offers a cozy and intimate atmosphere, perfect for unwinding after a long day of sightseeing or business meetings. Sip on a signature cocktail or sample some local craft beers while mingling with fellow guests. For those seeking ultimate relaxation, the hotel features a sauna where you can indulge in a rejuvenating steam session. Let the warm heat envelop your body and melt away any stress or tension. Afterward, take a refreshing dip in the sauna's plunge pool and emerge feeling refreshed and invigorated. If you prefer to spend time outdoors, the hotel boasts a beautiful garden where you can soak up the sun or simply enjoy the tranquility. Take a leisurely stroll through the lush greenery, find a quiet spot to read a book, or simply bask in the serenity of nature. Bookworms will find solace in the hotel's library, filled with a diverse selection of books for all tastes and interests. Whether you're a fan of fiction, non-fiction, or travel guides, you'll find something to captivate your imagination. Curl up in a comfortable armchair and lose yourself in a captivating story. Lastly, don't forget to visit the gift/souvenir shop to pick up a memento of your stay or find the perfect gift for loved ones back home. Browse through a range of unique and locally crafted items, from handmade jewelry to traditional Norwegian handicrafts. With its array of entertainment facilities, Clarion Collection Hotel Tollboden ensures that every guest's stay is filled with relaxation, enjoyment, and memorable experiences. Discover the Charming City of Drammen Nestled in the heart of Norway, the vibrant city of Drammen offers a perfect blend of natural beauty, cultural heritage, and modern amenities. As you step outside the doors of Clarion Collection Hotel Tollboden , you'll find yourself surrounded by a plethora of attractions and activities that will make your stay truly unforgettable. Take a leisurely stroll along the picturesque river promenade, where you can admire the stunning views of the Drammen River and its cascading waterfalls. Immerse yourself in the city's rich history by visiting the Drammen Museum, housed in a beautifully preserved 18th-century building. Explore the vibrant art scene at the Drammen Theatre, which hosts a variety of performances ranging from plays to concerts. For nature enthusiasts, the nearby Spiralen viewpoint offers breathtaking panoramic views of the city and its surrounding fjords. Indulge in a shopping spree at the bustling Bragernes Torg, the city's main square, where you can find a wide range of shops, boutiques, and cafes. After a day of exploration, treat yourself to a delectable meal at one of the many restaurants serving traditional Norwegian cuisine, or unwind with a refreshing drink at a local bar. Whether you're seeking adventure, relaxation, or cultural immersion, Drammen has something to offer for everyone, and Clarion Collection Hotel Tollboden is the perfect base to discover it all. Convenient Transportation Options from the Nearest Airports to Clarion Collection Hotel Tollboden in Drammen, Norway Located in the charming city of Drammen, Norway, Clarion Collection Hotel Tollboden offers a convenient and comfortable stay for travelers. Getting to the hotel from the nearest airports is a breeze, with several transportation options available. For travelers arriving at Oslo Airport, the most convenient way to reach Clarion Collection Hotel Tollboden is by train. The airport has a direct train connection to Drammen, which takes approximately 1 hour. The train station is conveniently located just a short walk away from the hotel, making it a hassle-free journey. Alternatively, taxis and rental cars are also readily available at the airport for those who prefer a more private and flexible mode of transportation. If you are flying into Sandefjord Airport Torp, there are bus services available that can take you directly to Drammen. The journey takes around 1 hour and 30 minutes, and the bus stop is conveniently located near Clarion Collection Hotel Tollboden . This option is a cost-effective and comfortable way to reach the hotel. No matter which airport you arrive at, the transportation options to Clarion Collection Hotel Tollboden in Drammen, Norway are convenient and efficient, ensuring a smooth and enjoyable journey for guests. From the airport, you will be able to experience the warm hospitality and comfortable accommodations that await you at this charming hotel. Explore the Rich Cultural Heritage and Natural Beauty near Clarion Collection Hotel Tollboden Located in the heart of Drammen, Norway, Clarion Collection Hotel Tollboden offers easy access to a range of fascinating landmarks and attractions. Immerse yourself in the rich cultural heritage and natural beauty of the area as you explore the nearby Gunnerud Gard Hestesenter. This charming equestrian center provides the perfect opportunity to experience the stunning Norwegian countryside on horseback. For those seeking outdoor adventure, Haukasloypa is a must-visit attraction. This picturesque hiking trail offers breathtaking views of the surrounding mountains, forests, and lakes. Strap on your hiking boots and embark on a memorable journey through nature's wonders. If you're a winter sports enthusiast, Drammen Ski Centre is just a short distance away. Hit the slopes and feel the rush of adrenaline as you ski or snowboard down the pristine trails. The ski center caters to all levels of experience, making it a perfect destination for both beginners and seasoned athletes. For a taste of local culture, head to Gulskogen Manor, a historic estate that dates back to the 18th century. Marvel at the stunning architecture and explore the beautifully maintained gardens. Additionally, Tangen Church, Stromsgodset Kirke, and Stromso Kirke offer a glimpse into the region's religious history with their impressive architecture and serene surroundings. Don't miss the chance to visit the bustling Port of Drammen, where you can admire the ships sailing in and out, or take a leisurely stroll along the waterfront promenade. Lastly, Skoger Old Church, with its medieval origins, is a fascinating landmark that showcases the area's rich history. With its prime location, Clarion Collection Hotel Tollboden is the perfect base for exploring these captivating landmarks and attractions. After a day of adventure, unwind in the hotel's comfortable rooms and indulge in the delicious dining options available onsite. Just a short walk away is the bustling Drammen Train Station, providing excellent connectivity to various destinations in Norway. Whether you're heading to Oslo for business or exploring the scenic landscapes of the surrounding areas, the train station offers frequent services that ensure a smooth and hassle-free journey. Additionally, the hotel is also close to several bus stops, including the nearby Bragernes Torg bus terminal. From here, you can catch buses to different parts of Drammen and beyond. With its strategic location near Drammen Train Station and convenient access to multiple bus stops, Clarion Collection Hotel Tollboden is the perfect base for both business and leisure travelers looking to explore Drammen and its surroundings. For those craving the exotic flavors of Indian cuisine, Punjabi Tikka Drammen offers a tantalizing menu of traditional Punjabi dishes bursting with aromatic spices. Pizza lovers can indulge in mouthwatering creations at Peppes Pizza, where the crispy crusts and generous toppings are sure to satisfy any craving. Soi Saam Thai Restaurant is a hidden gem, serving authentic Thai dishes made with fresh ingredients and bold flavors. Landfallhytta is the perfect spot for nature enthusiasts, offering a cozy dining experience with stunning views of the surrounding landscape. Anchas'bodega is a popular choice for those seeking a taste of the Mediterranean, where Spanish-inspired tapas and a wide selection of wines await. Moa Moa Cafe og Restaurant is a charming cafÃ© that serves up delicious breakfast options and hearty Scandinavian dishes. Delight is a vegetarian-friendly restaurant that focuses on creating innovative and flavorful plant-based meals. For those looking to unwind with a drink, Rekord Bar offers a wide selection of craft beers and signature cocktails in a trendy setting. Sushi enthusiasts will delight in the fresh and expertly crafted sushi rolls at Dream Sushi. For those looking for outdoor gear and adventure, the Norrona Concept Store Gulskogen is a must-visit, offering a wide range of high-quality outdoor clothing and equipment. Explore Drammen's Rich Cultural Heritage and Scenic Beauty near Scandic Ambassadeur Drammen Nestled in the heart of Drammen, Scandic Ambassadeur Drammen offers a prime location for exploring the city's rich cultural heritage and scenic beauty. Just a short distance away from the hotel, you'll find a plethora of landmarks and attractions that are sure to captivate your interest. For those seeking an equestrian adventure, Gunnerud Gard Hestesenter is a must-visit landmark. This charming horse center offers horseback riding experiences amidst picturesque surroundings, allowing you to connect with nature and experience the thrill of horse riding. For a taste of local culture, Gulskogen Manor is a historic landmark that dates back to the 18th century. Explore the beautifully preserved manor house and its gardens, and immerse yourself in the rich history of the region. Other notable attractions in the area include Tangen Church, Stromsgodset Kirke, and Stromso Kirke, all of which showcase stunning architecture and offer a glimpse into the city's religious heritage. The Port of Drammen is a bustling hub of activity, where you can witness ships coming and going, and soak in the vibrant atmosphere of this important maritime gateway. Last but not least, don't miss the Skoger Old Church, a charming medieval church that stands as a testament to the city's past.
